components.title: 委外發包(含運輸及人工)

data.custom: const ownerId = row.panel21TableSelect; if (ownerId) { const url = `http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/project1_3_vendor/${ownerId}`; return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { fetch(url) .then((response) => { if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Network response was not ok'); } return response.json(); }) .then((data) => { const items = data.map((project) => ({ label: project.name, value: project.id })); resolve(items); }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error fetching projects:', error); reject(error); }); }); } else { console.log('Owner ID is not selected yet'); return []; }

components.label: 金額
components.calculateValue: if (row.panel21TableSelect && row.panel21Table3) { var url = `http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/project1_3_vendor/` + row.panel21TableSelect + '/' + row.panel21Table3; var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open('GET', url, false); xhr.send(); value = parseInt(xhr.responseText) || 0; } else { value = 0; };
